"For the past 10 years, Eric Schmidt has grown Google into an extraordinarily successful company. Our core business is growing and our emerging businesses are on fire," a Google spokesman said. Google's board has made compensation a key issue this year. This is a major leap forward. This is a major milestone for her and we're hoping that she crosses through many more, said her neurosurgeon Dr. Michael Lemole. Sen.
